comment: Overall good professor and class. 3 reading responses, 4 formal essays(last one is a revision essay), a few discussion boards and peer reviews are mandatory + crucial to grade. Attendance is so-so. She isn't a tough grader, very lenient, and always ended class early. Never rlly used the textbook.

This class was super easy to me but since its online if you send her an email she doesnt anwser in a timely manner. The workload is a lot but just turn everything in. I turned an assignment 3 weeks late and still recived an 100 so theres that. It can get a little overwhemling at times but you got it.

She's a really nice person and prof. occasionally her grading criteria can be a bit unclear. Attendance only matters on a few specific days, but she'll remember if you never show up to class, so try. you need to do a presentation in front of the class, so if you have severe severe social anxiety I wouldn't take her. Overall, a good prof! I recomend
I feel like I didn't really gain anything from being in the class
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Lots of homework--So many papers

comment: She was a very easy professor and kept things at a manageable pace. As long as you showed up and did the work to the best of your abilities, it was a very easy A. She wasn't always the clearest at instructions but will answer her emails relatively quickly with any questions or concerns. I definitely recommend her to anyone just needing the credit.
She was a great teacher that ended up being pretty laid back. We had several essays this semester and as long as you showed up for peer reviews you ended up doing well on them.
Literally the easiest class I've ever taken. Just put effort into your papers and you're golden.
Easy A. You write smaller papers which become one larger paper at end of the semester. Gives great resources for research.

I absolutely loved her class! I took the hybrid class so we only met once a week and she canceled just a few times. As long as you do all the work and show up to class (unless you have an unexcused absence), it is an easy A! She was very understanding about the whole quarantine thing and did not overload us with work. I would 100% take her again!!
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: she's a very sweet and understanding lady. only 4 essays but did have to write 2 small papers on one of the textbooks. she says to buy 2 books but only used them once or twice. highly recommend!!!

Basically this class consisted of one big project, to write a research proposal. She's really helpful with showing you exactly what she is wanting. i took the class that met once a week (half online) and we still did everything mostly in class. You want to give yourself about 3 hours a week outside of class to do work. easy class and sweet teacher
Great teacher! Definitely would recommend.

Definitely recommend taking her class. she's very fair and does not overload her students with work. a lot of her graded assignments are small items done in class so show up. No tests, just papers. The topics we wrote about were very fun to write about and she has us do a lot of peer reviews so actually do your rough drafts.

Prof Anderson was great! All of her assignments were clear and easy. Took hybrid class so attendance was mandatory but she did cancel class a few times. Not a tough grader and she's great about emailing you back quick! She wants her students to pass and she wants to help however she can. I had a great semester with her and would recommend her!!
Good professor. Grades super easily. dont use the textbook besides for like one online quiz. I took the hybrid. Super easy course. Got a 99 overall. shes also very sweet.

I took this as a hybrid class so coming to class was mandatory since we only met once a week. Overall she is an amazing professor. If you come to class and do what your supposed to do you can easily pass this class. She helps her students as much as possible and gives great feedback. She also tries to make writing interesting as possible.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: The main thing is check your email every day. She expects you to. In class she is nice and instructions are clear. She uses both books frequently. If you check your email, do all the assignments,  and show up it's an easy A.

Dr. Anderson was really helpful. She gives good individual feedback. 4 Essays, one is the final for the course. Her class typically was short and sweet ending before scheduled. Very approachable professor. Enjoyed her class. She does use both assigned textbooks, so be sure to get those.

I enjoyed her class. I frowned upon writing until taking her class. She simplifies the process. I learned a lot and became a better writer because of her instruction. All she requires is for you to attend class and participate in class assignments. She rarely assigns homework (if assigned, it's reading). Overall a good teacher!
EASY A! Four essays (approx 4 paged DOUBLE spaced), no quizzes, no midterm, no final!
